Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Toccata in F minor, BWV Anh. 85

? · BWV3 App C, p. 715

[IMSLP]

This piece exists in two different versions, of which both are possibly spurious; another attribution is to an S. Dobenecker.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 12 · BA 5296-01 · Werke zweifelhafter Echtheit für Tasteninstrumente · ed. Ulrich Bartels / Frieder Rempp [both versions]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5250 · Werke zweifelhafter Echtheit für Tasteninstrumente · ed. Ulrich Bartels / Frieder Rempp [both versions]

Version A

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5

Version B

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
